summary: Vanuatu is a small island country in the South Pacific Ocean, east of Australia. It's made up of many volcanic islands and was first explored by Europeans in 1606. Over time, France and the United Kingdom took control of different parts of the islands. In 1980, Vanuatu gained independence and became its own country. Today, it's known for its unique culture and beautiful landscapes. It's a member of the United Nations and other international groups.
title: Vanuatu
